name: Sisméo
tagline: Web Agency Focusing on Digital Strategy
description:
Sismé0 is a web agency with a global approach to communication on the Internet. We have been providing advice, creation, development and visibility solutions on the web since 2004. Our services include website creation as well as app development through PHP, OPEN SOURCE, and iOS. Our creative services also include logo design, graphic charter, web design animation, development, and Flash games.
We also offer search engine optimization (SEO), Google Adwords Maintenance, and statistical monitoring.
